txt.en: Defeat Nightmare, his lieutenants, and escape the Halls of Night.
You have defeated the fell spirit Terror in the Halls of Night.
You have become ensnared in the Halls of Night and must defeat Nightmare and his lieutenants before it is too late.
You have defeated the fell spirit Panic in the Halls of Night.
You have destroyed the sorcerer Nightmare in the Halls of Night.
To earn this deed you must defeat Terror, Panic, and Nightmare.
To earn this deed you must defeat Terror, Panic, and Nightmare.
